revised_title: A New Theory of Optical and Electrical Properties of Liquids
tldr: The author presents a new theory for the optical and electrical properties of liquids, considering molecular anisotropy and local fields. The theory explains the deviations from the Lorentz formula and provides a quantitative explanation for the behavior of various liquids. The study also highlights the importance of considering the orientation of molecules in the fluid and the asymmetry of molecules in dense fluids.
